name: Terminal Colony
description:
Terminal Colony is a game created in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018. We spent few more days after the event to tweak some stuff and make it playable ;)

The core gameplay is inspired by many "clicker" games, but there is a small twist. Instead of playing for many days, weeks or months, the session ends in exactly 5 minutes. When the time is up, you can try again and beat your top score.

The team:

  • Jan Ilavsky - https://twitter.com/Split82/
  • Vladimir Hrincar - https://twitter.com/lokimansk
  • Peter Hrincar - https://twitter.com/hrincarp
  • A. Daniel Garcia Aranda - https://twitter.com/polygonalmind
  • Aleix Ramon - https://twitter.com/nomad_composer
